searchConfiguration.name: Raw TextField usage
searchConfiguration.description: We want to add some extra behavior to all text fields. This behavior will not be added by instantiating a TextField directly, so use our general factory function UncivTextField.create instead.

searchConfiguration.name: Gdx Input.Keys toString
searchConfiguration.description: Gdx Input.Keys has a buggy definition for DEL that makes the Del and Backspace keys misbehave. See KeyCharAndCode.toString.
searchConfiguration.problemDescriptor: Gdx bug - Wrong results for BACKSPACE DEL and FORWARD_DEL.

searchConfiguration.name: Gdx Input.Keys valueOf
searchConfiguration.description: Gdx Input.Keys has a buggy definition for DEL that makes the Del and Backspace keys misbehave. See GdxKeyCodeFixes.
searchConfiguration.problemDescriptor: Gdx bug - Wrong results for BACKSPACE DEL and FORWARD_DEL.

searchConfiguration.name: Gdx Input.Keys DEL
searchConfiguration.description: Gdx Input.Keys has a buggy definition for DEL that makes the Del and Backspace keys misbehave. See GdxKeyCodeFixes.
searchConfiguration.problemDescriptor: Gdx bug - Wrong results for BACKSPACE DEL and FORWARD_DEL.
